title: Swamp decay

properties.name: description
properties.value: Swamp decay is a game mechanic occurring in the Mort Myre Swamp, starting when the player enters the swamp from one of three entrances. The first entrance is the gate located south of Canifis. The second is the swamp exit of the Myreque Hideout. The third is a line of three tiles located north of the bridge near the Nature Grotto (NOT the bridge that players must jump across). Every two minutes that the player is in the swamp, a green bubble will appear and hit the player between one and three damage. If the player leaves the swamp through the gate, it will immediately restart the timer.

content:
A player being hit by the swamp decay.

Swamp decay is a game mechanic occurring in the Mort Myre Swamp, starting when the player enters the swamp from one of three entrances. The first entrance is the gate located south of Canifis. The second is the swamp exit of the Myreque Hideout. The third is a line of three tiles located north of the bridge near the Nature Grotto (NOT the bridge that players must jump across). Every two minutes that the player is in the swamp, a green bubble will appear and hit the player between one and three damage. If the player leaves the swamp through the gate, it will immediately restart the timer.

When the timer hits two minutes, depending on the player's location within or around the swamp, they will either get the chatbox message: The swamp decays you!, or The swamp decay effect is now over. depending on whether the player still counts being in the swamp or not. The tiles that count as being in the swamp are tied to mapsquares, meaning that there are some tiles east of the Digsite that will continue the effect. Walking on these tiles will not start the effect.

Wielding a silver sickle (b), rod of ivandis or having the fire of dehumidification lit will prevent the swamp decay from ever hitting the player. The fire of dehumidification requires 50 Construction, 66 Firemaking, and completion of Making Friends with My Arm, and will also negate the rotting effect of the Ghasts.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
6 September 2018
(update | poll)

Swamp decay can now be nullified by building the Fire of Dehumidification.
